{{Evil flag}} |resistances={{Poison resistance}}, {{Cold resistance}} |vulnerabilities={{Fire vulnerability}} |max_chunks=0 |meat={{No corpse}} |xp=1703 |holiness={{Demonic}} |magic_resistance=144 |hp_range=36 - 96 |avg_hp=66 |armour_class=10 |evasion=10 |habitat=land |speed=12 |size={{Large}} |item_use={{Open doors}} |attack1=20 ({{Hit type}}: {{Plain flavour}}) |attack2=20 ({{Hit type}}: {{Plain flavour}}) |attack3= |attack4= |hit_dice=12 |base_hp=3 |extra_hp=5 |fixed_hp=0 |intelligence={{High intelligence}} |genus=blue death |species=blue death }} {{Flavour|A blue greater demon.}} ==Useful Info== A '''Blue Death''' is a tier-[[1]] demon which attacks with [[electricity]] and [[cold]] damage spells, as well as extremely random summoned creatures. Spells: [[Lightning Bolt]] (3d18), [[Bolt of Cold]] (3d21), [[Call Imp]], [[Shadow Creatures]], and [[Teleport Other]] ==Tips & Tricks== *The Shadow Creatures spell creates a random area-appropriate monster or band of monsters. Depending on where you are fighting, this can result in nearly any enemy being summoned up to fight you. Having [[Abjuration]] ready may help. *Blue Deaths are vulnerable to fire and have unimpressive [[EV]]. Any character can [[wand of fire]] one easily. ==History== Blue deaths were removed in [[0.10]]. [[Category:Demon]] [[Category:Obsolete monsters]]
